About

Hi there!

I'm Guilherme Fujiyoshi, a 24 years old boy who lives in Curitiba, Brazil.

When I was still a teenager (13-14 years old), I attempted to create my first web page. Although it doesn't worked as I expected at that time, that was enough to get me introduced in the programming world.

When I was 17 years old, I decided to take the bachelor in Information Systems course at the Federal University of Technology - Paran√°, where I occasionally got graduated.

Nowadays I work full-time as a full stack developer. Actually, I work as little as possible on the back-end side, but sometimes I have to get my hands dirty!

I love my career, but besides that I love other things too! Whenever possible, I like to play games (classic programmer), play my guitars or hang out with my friends.

Now, I'll stop with the cheap talk (yes, I love that too!). In the following sections you can find more information about me (the relevant ones, I'd say).
